Package JEST.cards

package JEST.cards
This package contains all the classes linked to the cards in the game : A Card is a SuitCard or a JokerCard. An offer is composed by 2 offercards, who are face-up or face-down cards. The deck is general or the rest of the cards unused in the last round. CardVisitor and ScoreVisitor permit the separation of data from a class's processing, access control. The Jest is the list of the cards that the player gets during the rounds.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    JEST
    This package contains the general classes of JEST: Game: this is the most important class of the game.

  • Class
    Description
    Card
    This is a general card : we define the trophy of the card, and declare abstract the methods to get the face value and the suit (we define them if it is a suitcard).
    CardVisitor
    This interface allows access to the scores obtained by the suit cards or the joker card.
    Deck
    This class defines the decks : we can shuffle it, fill it...
    DeckType
    This enum class permits to define the two types of Deck fixed by the design pattern Multiton : the general and the "restOfCards".
    Jest
    This class defines the list of cards that the player detains during all the game.
